title: Heavy Duty Table Saw
dis: Makita - 2712 is a durable 315mm (12-3/8') table saw. It is powered by a heavy-duty induction motor for high performance and a long, maintenance-free service life. https://makita.in/product/2712/

title: Handheld LCR Meters
dis: The U1733C handheld LCR meters allow you to measure frequencies as high as 100 kHz, a capability typically found only in benchtop meters. These handheld capacitance meters provide extra capabilities and functionalities into electronics assembly and passive components troubleshooting with up to 25 sets of High/Low limits.
